name: PCKG_SALES
body_snippet:
package pckg_sales is

  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 21-05-2003 5:15:05 PM
  -- Purpose : Contains PROCEDURES & temporary variables..... etc,
  --           which control the updation of purchase related tables &
  --           mutation in different triggers


-------- purchase related trigger controls -----------------
 -- PURCHASE_INVOICE_MT
 -- PURCHASE_INVOICE_DET
 -- PURCH_INVOICE_EXP_REB_MT
 -- PURCH_INV_EXP_REB_PRORATE_MT
 -- GRN_MT
 -- GRN_DET
 -- RMA_INWARD_MT
 -- EMA_INWARD_DET


     PROCEDURE trgr_biu_sales_exp_reb_mt(parm_invoice_id NUMBER,parm_old_tc_amount number ,parm_new_tc_amount NUMBER ,parm_new_amount IN OUT NUMBER) ;
     PROCEDURE trgr_biu_inv_stax_detail (parm_invoice_det_id NUMBER,parm_old_tc_amount number ,parm_new_tc_amount NUMBER ,parm_new_amount IN OUT NUMBER) ;

     PROCEDURE TRGR_AIUD_sales_EXP_REB_PRO(parm_old_invoice_id NUMBER,parm_new_invoice_id NUMBER);
     PROCEDURE TRGR_BIU_sales_EXP_REB_PRO(parm_invoice_id NUMBER,parm_old_tc_amount number ,parm_new_tc_amount NUMBER ,parm_new_amount IN OUT NUMBER) ;
     PROCEDURE TRGR_STAT_AIUD_sales_E_R_PRO;

     PROCEDURE TRGR_BIU_INV_DETAIL(parm_invoice_id NUMBER,parm_old_tc_amount IN NUMBER,parm_new_tc_amount number,parm_new_amount IN OUT NUMBER ,parm_old_tax_tc_amount NUMBER,parm_new_tax_tc_amount NUMBER,parm_new_tax_amount IN OUT NUMBER ,parm_old_comm_tc_amount NUMBER ,parm_new_comm_tc_amount NUMBER,parm_new_comm_amount IN OUT NUMBER) ;
     PROCEDURE TRGR_BD_INV_DETAIL(parm_old_inv_d
